relation: Disarmament and dissolution of illegal radical groups
Defining the clear perspective of economy of the South-East (support to enterprises in the region)
Creation of parliamentary coalition with participation of the Party of Regions
Appointment of representatives of the South-East on ministerial positions
Balanced cultural policy with regard to national peculiarities and mentality of citizens in the South-East
Dissociation of authorities from nationalist and radical rhetoric
Reestablishment of dialog (economic and political ) with Russia
Introduction of the second state language
Pre-term elections of the President of Ukraine
Establishment of permanent public dialog between the South-East and central government
Distinguishing by central authority between positions and interests of ordinary citizens in the region and it’s party-oligarchic elites
pageTitle: Press releases and reports - The views and opinions of South-Eastern regions residents of Ukraine: April 2014
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {11825=The survey “Opinions and views of the citizens of Southern and Eastern regions of Ukraine: April 2014” was conducted by the Kyiv International Institute of Sociology during April 8-16, 2014. The results are representative for the population (18 years and older) of each of 8 regions (oblasts) of the South and the East of Ukraine (Odesa, Mykolaiiv, Kherson, Kharkiv, Luhansk, Dnipropetrovsk, Zaporizhzhia, and Donetsk oblasts).}
